fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config.IConfigStoreEventListener

    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation
    Defines annotations and interfaces for declaring and accessing dependencies.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config
    Services for configuring ViewShell components and plug-in components.

    • Uses of IConfigStoreEventListener in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation

      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation with parameters of type IConfigStoreEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IServiceContext.setConfigStoreEventListener(IConfigStoreEventListener listener)
      Sets the event listener for external changes to the default configuration store.
      void IServiceContext.setConfigStoreEventListener(String auxiliaryId, IConfigStoreEventListener listener)
      Sets the event listener for external changes to an auxiliary configuration store.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IConfigStore IConfigService.createAuxiliaryConfigStore(String auxiliaryId, IConfigStoreEventListener configStoreEventListener, IConfigServiceEventListener configServiceEventListener)
      Creates a secondary persistent configuration object, automatically identified by the symbolic name of the OSGi bundle requiring this service and the auxiliary identifier.
      IConfigStore IConfigService.createConfigStore(IConfigStoreEventListener configStoreEventListener, IConfigServiceEventListener configServiceEventListener)
      Creates a default persistent configuration object, automatically identified by the symbolic name of the OSGi bundle requiring this service.
